author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...HURRICANE HELENE MOVING RAPIDLY NORTHWARD THROUGH GEORGIA... ...400 AM EDT POSITION UPDATE...
summary:
...HURRICANE HELENE MOVING RAPIDLY NORTHWARD THROUGH GEORGIA... ...400 AM EDT POSITION UPDATE...
 As of 4:00 AM EDT Fri Sep 27
 the center of Helene was located near 32.4, -83.1
 with movement N at 30 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 963 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 75 mph.
